content: प्रभु {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (भु-भ्वी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) {@--1@} Mighty, strong, powerful. {@--2@} Able, competent, having power to (with <ab>inf.</ab> or in <ab>comp.</ab>); ऋषि प्रभावान्मयि नांतकोऽपि प्रभुः प्रहर्तुं किमुतान्यहिंस्राः <ls>R. 2. 62</ls>; समाधिभेदप्रभवो भवति <ls>Ku. 3. 40.</ls> {@--3@} A match for; प्रभुर्मल्लो मल्लाय <ls>Mbh.</ls> {@--4@} Abundant. {@--5@} Everlasting, eternal. --भुः {@--1@} A lord, master; प्रभुर्बुभूषुर्भुवनत्रयस्य यः <ls>Śi. 1. 49.</ls> {@--2@} A governor, ruler, supreme authority. {@--3@} An owner, proprietor. {@--4@} Quick-silver. {@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of Viṣṇu. {@--6@} Of Śiva. {@--7@} Of Brahmā. {@--8@} Of Indra.
